content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All work performed for EPAM must be in full compliance with EPAM Code of Ethical Conduct, available on our website at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://investors.epam.com/code-ethical-conduct-0\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and the principles contained herein (collectively “Supplier Code of Conduct”). This Supplier Code of Conduct applies to all Suppliers and their parent, subsidiary and affiliated entities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each Supplier should carefully review this Supplier Code of Conduct and ensure that all of Supplier's personnel and agents associated with EPAM Systems strictly comply with it in its dealings with EPAM Systems and others in the course of its relationship with EPAM Systems. Certification of Compliance must be provided to EPAM Systems, and EPAM Systems may monitor or audit for compliance from time to time. Compliance with this Supplier Code of Conduct, as may be updated or amended from time to time, is mandatory for all Suppliers in our supply chain.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
